typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		unitprice as integer,
		Color as string,
		inserted_date as date,
		Lastupdate_date as date,
		Whash as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Withhash
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		unitprice as integer,
		Color as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> withouthash
withouthash derive(oltphash = sha1(Name+ProductNumber+Color)) ~> DerivedColumn
DerivedColumn, Withhash exists(oltphash == Whash,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists
Exists, Withhash lookup(withouthash@ProductID == Withhash@ProductID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup
Lookup alterRow(insertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		unitprice as integer,
		Color as string,
		inserted_date as date,
		Lastupdate_date as date,
		Whash as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		ProductID = withouthash@ProductID,
		Name = withouthash@Name,
		ProductNumber = withouthash@ProductNumber,
		unitprice = withouthash@unitprice,
		Color = withouthash@Color,
		Whash = oltphash,
		ProductID = Withhash@ProductID,
		Name = Withhash@Name,
		ProductNumber = Withhash@ProductNumber,
		unitprice = Withhash@unitprice,
		Color = Withhash@Color,
		inserted_date,
		Lastupdate_date,
		Whash
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
